title: Kayn still not 6300!!
body: Kayn been released more than 1 week ago and its still 7800.Today whould be reduced to 6300 but its 6PM GMT and its not been reduced!!

replies.body: Kayn's IP has been reduced now, but you might need to relog to reflect the update.  Thanks for waiting!

>Thanks for waiting!

Although I dread free week champions (because I won't get to play Kayn as much), I still have to ask. Aren't new champions usually added to the Free Champion Rotation  on their second week of release?
Come on, be patient. Is just 1500 IP, and for free. Well, the IP costs time, and time its gold.
